At that time, he had unwavering faith in the Dharma. Each of the three stages has dull faculties and sharp faculties. The person is said to be an arhat with liberation from doubt, and the fourth and below have liberation in the present moment. The fifth is able to pass through the six fires, but the fourth and below are unable to pass through.
The person says it is indeed three and below, and four and above is the Dharma.
This person is three and below, so it is called protection.
